Post’s Bass to U.N. as Rice advisor/speechwriter

The Washington Post‘s Al Kamen reports that Warren Bass, Link: http://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/2009/01/21/AR2009012103687_pf.html that Warren Bass, the deputy editor of the Post‘s  Post‘s  Outlook section and previously a staffer with the 9/11 Commission, has been tapped to be Susan

Rice‘s speechwriter and advisor at the United Nations. UPDATE: The Senate voted unanimously to confirm Rice as ambassador to the U.N. Thursday night.
